      • doPlayerNameDialog

        public void doPlayerNameDialog(java.lang.String playernames,
                               java.lang.String KingColors,
                               boolean canStartgame,
                               int playernumber,
                               int kingnumber)
        called by PlayerClient when server requested REGISTRATION
        Parameters:
        playernames - comma (;) delimited already registered player names
        KingColors - comma (;) delimited already reserved king colors
        canStartgame - true is user is allowed to request start game
        playernumber - the player number assigned by server
        kingnumber - the player number assigned by server

      • PlayerNameDialog

        public void PlayerNameDialog(Stage parent,
                             boolean canStartgame,
                             java.lang.String playernames,
                             java.lang.String KingColors,
                             int playernumber,
                             int kingnumber,
                             boolean secondKing)
        displays the registration modal dialog (asks for player name and color) and sets the player info of this player (0 or 1) in PlayerClient.players table
        Parameters:
        parent - parent Stage
        canStartgame - true is user is allowed to request start game
        playernames - comma (;) delimited already registered player names
        KingColors - comma (;) delimited already reserved king colors
        playernumber - the player number assigned by server
        kingnumber - the player number assigned by server
        secondKing - true if is registration for second king

        PlayerClient calls it when server sent updatePlayersJoined

        clientNum -
        playerNum -
        kingNum -
